title: Apply Page 1 color updates (wine heading, unicorn silver body, thyme CTA button)

requirements.text: Update Page 1 (IntroPage) heading text color to exactly #722F37 (wine) using a Tailwind arbitrary color class or equivalent so it renders with that exact hex value.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Intro page, the main heading renders in hex color #722F37.
The change is visible in the browser and is not dependent on existing theme tokens such as `text-wine`.

requirements.text: Update Page 1 (IntroPage) body paragraph text color to exactly #E8E8E8 (unicorn silver) using a Tailwind arbitrary color class or equivalent so it renders with that exact hex value.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Intro page, the main paragraph renders in hex color #E8E8E8.
The paragraph remains readable against the background and the color change is visible in the browser.

requirements.text: Update the Page 1 call-to-action element that navigates to the next page (the clickable CTA box on IntroPage) so its background color uses exactly #669966 (thyme), preserving the existing alpha/opacity behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Intro page, the clickable CTA box (that navigates to the proposal page) has a background color based on hex #669966.
The CTA box still navigates to the next page when clicked.
Hover/transition behavior remains present after the color update.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: No changes to Page 2/ProposalPage button styling unless required to satisfy the Page 1 CTA color request.
No text/content copy edits (only color changes requested).
